name: Gold's Gym Langley
address: Gold's Gym Langley, 19989 81a Ave, Langley Twp, BC V2Y 0C7

featured_reviews.review_id: Facilities are clean and place is relatively well taken care of. Good culture and the place doesn't get as rushed as more budget gyms I've been to in the past. I have done personal training with Vish - would recommend as you get to learn proper form, technique, have a workout plan. Plus with the personal training, there's a seperate room dedicated for it so you don't have to wait or worry about rush in the general gym faculties itself. The place has decent amount of parking as well including an underground. Overall would recommend this gym and it's personal training services.
featured_reviews.review_text: Facilities are clean and place is relatively well taken care of. Good culture and the place doesn't get as rushed as more budget gyms I've been to in the past. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Ayaan, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! We're thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your experience at Gold's Gym Langley and that our facilities are clean and well-maintained. It's also great to know that you've had a positive personal training experience with Vish and that our separate room for personal training sessions has been convenient for you.

We truly appreciate your recommendation of our gym and our personal training services. If you have any further feedback or suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. Thank you for choosing Gold's Gym Langley, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Gold's Gym Langley

featured_reviews.review_id:
Parking's always full, staff is either rude or too busy to even bother you're there. They'll promise you that the gym is due for an equipment upgrade but nothing changes. Treadmills come to a dead stop while running and the management couldn't be bothered less. Half of them don't even work.
Gym equipment is thrown about by other members but they will only enforce re-racking rules when it suits them. Staff is not trained in customer service at all. They only service you when they need to lock you into a contract. Forget even getting so much as a greeting while entering the premises after that.

Would give it a half star rating if I could.

Nothing premium about this gym. Definitely not worth $60 a month. Save your $ and look elsewhere.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Anil,

Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and concerns about your experiences at our gym. We value all feedback, as it helps us identify areas for improvement and make necessary changes to enhance our services.

We apologize for the challenges you've faced, particularly regarding the parking availability, staff interactions, equipment maintenance, and overall customer service. We understand how crucial it is to have a positive gym environment that supports your fitness journey.

Regarding the issues with the gym equipment and their functionality, our maintenance team is actively working to address these concerns promptly. We are committed to ensuring a safe and enjoyable workout environment for all members.

Furthermore, we appreciate your feedback about staff conduct and attentiveness. We strive to provide exceptional customer service, and your comments will be used for additional training and development to enhance our team's interactions with our members.

Regarding the re-racking rules, we acknowledge the importance of maintaining order and cleanliness in the gym. We will reinforce our policies to ensure all members are aware and encouraged to follow them.

We are continuously working on plans for equipment upgrades. Just last month, we changed the whole lighting in the facility, got new machine  and racks. Next month we are getting another Hip Thrust and a Pendulum Squat. We are committed to making improvements to provide the best possible experience. 

If you would like to discuss your concerns further or have any suggestions for improvement, please feel free to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. We value your feedback and aim to address your concerns to make your experience at our gym better.

Thank you for being a part of our gym community, and we hope to have the opportunity to improve your experience in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a great experience at Gold's Gym Langley! I encountered a minor issue, but Dylan quickly resolved it with outstanding customer service. Thanks to him, my visit was smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend this gym!
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a great experience at Gold's Gym Langley! I encountered a minor issue, but Dylan quickly resolved it with outstanding customer service. Thanks to him, my visit was smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend this gym!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with our gym. We understand your frustration and we apologize for the lack of communication and customer service you received. We take customer service very seriously and we are committed to providing a positive experience for all our members. Please be aware that our staff hours are until 6:00 pm on Sunday and hence no one could attend you on that day at 7pm. 

However will be more than happy to discuss and assist you in resolving this matter. Please give us a call at (604) 882-4653 to reach out directly to our management team. 

Thank you for your continued loyalty to Gold's Gym, and we value you as a member of our community. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve our services and customer experience.

We appreciate your understanding, and we look forward to the opportunity to resolve this matter and welcome you back to Gold's Gym.

featured_reviews.review_id:
UGH

Don't get membership only if you think "cool, they have pool, hot tub, steam room..."

Showers are old and dirty, hot tub doesn't work most of the time.

Washrooms are old and not pleasant to use like in newer gyms. Same as women's workout area, very few old machines.

Cleanliness. It's just embarrassing, I can't say more. Just check it out before you sign up.

Customer service. They don't make you feel welcomed most of the time, unfortunately.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We genuinely appreciate your input, as it helps us make important improvements to our gym. We want to assure you that your concerns are not falling on deaf ears, and we're actively working to enhance your experience at our facility.

Cleanliness: We understand that cleanliness is a top priority for our members, and we've recently switched to a new cleaning company. They are in the process of learning the unique requirements of our gym, and we're committed to ensuring that our facility is spotless and well-maintained at all times.

Equipment: We're thrilled to let you know that we're investing in our gym's equipment. A new machine is on its way to the women's workout area, and one for the common area as well. We're continuously evaluating ways to improve the overall equipment offering for both our male and female members.

Facility Upgrades: We have plans in place to renovate our washrooms, both for men and women. We understand that this is a significant project, and we're diligently working to align our budget to ensure that these renovations are carried out to meet the high standards we aim to provide.

Customer Service: We're sorry to hear that you didn't always feel welcomed. We're committed to ensuring that every member's experience is positive, and we'll be conducting further training to ensure that our staff creates a friendly and welcoming atmosphere for all our members.

We value your feedback and your continued support. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we look forward to providing you with an improved gym experience. If you have any more feedback or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly. We're here to listen and make your gym experience better.

Thank you for being a part of our gym community.

featured_reviews.review_id: Gym is spacious and fairly clean. However, there are very little clips/carabiners, so half of the cable machines you cannot use. The gym gets very busy which makes this a huge problem. Also, equipment isn't replaced at the rate it should be for a gym with this much traffic. You will see lots of cable attachments that are torn, cracked or damaged in some way.
featured_reviews.review_text: Gym is spacious and fairly clean. However, there are very little clips/carabiners, so half of the cable machines you cannot use. The gym gets very busy which makes this a huge problem. Also, equipment isn't replaced at the rate it should be for a gym with this much traffic. You will see lots of cable attachments that are torn, cracked or damaged in some way.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Matt,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about our gym. We appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you find our facility spacious and fairly clean.

We understand your concerns regarding the availability of clips/carabiners and the state of some of our cable attachments. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we will take steps to address these issues.

Regarding equipment replacement, we strive to maintain a high level of quality for our gym equipment and make regular assessments to ensure it is up to standard. However, we recognize that with high traffic, wear and tear can occur more quickly. We will take your feedback into consideration as we continue to improve our facilities.

Thank you again for your valuable feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to improve your experience in the future.

Best regards,
Sidak
Gym Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
- Please fix the machines that are broken why pay maintenance fees when there is no maintenance. There is quite a lot of machines broken. Or just replace them and get new ones.

- Renovate your showers, lockers, change rooms, washroom stalls. They are old enough to be due for reno.

- Steam room needs to be bigger. Saunas are old and broken need to be replaced.

- Drinking water is always cold. There should be option for room temperature water as well during winter months.

- Upstairs washroom door locks/door closers need replacement. These are heavily used doors so maintenance should be up to date.

I don't see any improvement since I have joined.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Moved and was looking for a gym closer . Very glad I kept my other gym memberships. We got Sucked into a contract-  the best way to get a decent monthly fee but now I'm committed to full fill my 2 years. Other than location, the reason we joined was because of the hot tub and pool. Hot tub has been out of order 35% of times I have been here to work out.  Back hall to pool is cold and showers are awful. No hooks or benches to keep your towel or clothing off the floor and dry and it's too wet, dirty and cold to want to use them without having your change of clothing with you  During busy times no staff putting away weights, can't find anything. We work out in the evenings and often there are 3+ staff behind the counter, they say hi- but seem more interested in talking about their dates and looking at a hotel others phones.

I asked for a discount. I'm stuck in a contract and hoped it was the least they could do for me. It took 3 months and at least 6 calls and requests to have the mama heft contact me and was told no. I'm going to ask a lawyer to go over my contact and see if I can just end it

I still have my member ship with Anytime Fitness and am glad. I won't be renewing my membership when this one's done.
featured_reviews.review_text:

I still have my member ship with Anytime Fitness and am glad. I won't be renewing my membership when this one's done.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Lacey,

Thanks for writing a detailed review for us as it helps us do better !

Firstly, we understand the importance of the amenities, such as the hot tub and pool, that we offer at our gym. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the intermittent closures earlier this year. We acknowledge that there were maintenance challenges that affected the availability of the hot tub during the months you mentioned.

Firstly, one of the pipes that was essential for the functioning of the hot tub broke down unexpectedly. We ordered the new parts right away but because of the supply chain issues it took longer than expected. Further, there were chemical imbalances and a sudden visit by Fraser health led us to closing it. We have taken measures to rectify the situation and are pleased to inform you that the hot tub has been fully operational for a considerable period now, without any reported issues. Also, we drain the water every Thursday to fill it back in and that has helped us a whole lot in preventing these unforeseen occurrences.

As for the club runs, we value your feedback and will definitely be talking to the staff to better utilize their time and are more attentive to the member needs. 

While we are unable to offer a discount on your membership, as our membership agreements and pricing structure are standardized for all members, we are committed to providing you with an improved experience moving forward. We value your loyalty and feedback, and we are dedicated to making the necessary improvements to ensure you have a positive and enjoyable time at our gym.


We are truly sorry to hear that you won't be renewing your membership with us, but we respect your decision and hope you continue to enjoy your membership with Anytime Fitness. If there's anything else we can do to improve your experience, please don't hesitate to let us know.

featured_reviews.review_id:
TOTAL SCAM. I would have given 0 star if possible.
They pushed me into buying a membership and personal training packages, signing their awful contract ,and of course, they charged me a fortune. I specifically inquired about cancellation policies because I expected to move and wouldn't be able to commute to any Gold's Gym locations. They assured me I could cancel without fees if I moved, but I don't even want to remember how much they charged me before finally canceling my membership. It was a terrible experience dealing with the gym manager of that time,Jean, and I'm traumatized from ever considering any gym contract/packages again!

I still regret not disputing all the money they charged me for both the gym membership and PT sessions, even though I couldn't use any of the sessions for months after expressing my desire to cancel my membership.
The only positive aspect was my personal trainer, Michelle, who I learned a lot from, and she had nothing to do with the management's actions.
Overall, the worst gym facility experience.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
I'm truly sorry to learn about the negative experience you had with our gym. Your feedback is  important, and I want to express my sincerest apologies for the frustration and inconvenience you've endured as a result of your interactions with our team.

I completely understand your concern about the membership and personal training packages you were pushed into purchasing, especially considering the subsequent challenges with cancellation and associated charges. It's disheartening to know that our handling of your situation fell short of your expectations, causing you distress and a reluctance to consider gym contracts in the future.

Normally, if you are moving 30km away from the gym and provide a copy of one of the acceptable proof of move, it should have been a seamless process. Regardless, I apologize for any confusion or lack of clarity in our cancellation policies at that time. We are committed to improving our policies to ensure they're transparent and member-friendly to prevent such instances in the future.

I deeply regret any negative experiences you had with our previous gym manager, Jean. Rest assured, we take your concerns seriously and will look into this matter further to enhance our management interactions and overall customer service.

On a positive note, I'm glad to hear that your personal trainer, Michelle, made a positive impact during your time at our gym. Our trainers are dedicated to helping members like you achieve their fitness goals, and it's heartening to know that Michelle played a valuable role in your fitness journey.

If there's anything more you'd like to share or if you have specific suggestions on how we can improve our services, I'm here to listen. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we're committed to using it to make meaningful changes to provide a better experience for all our members.
